description:
“ I don't care how you faked it. I want to know why."“我不想知道你是怎么做到的，我想知道你为什么要这样做。”

It's a great day to be a Sherlock fan. BBC One released the official launch trailer for the upcoming three-episode——a glorious minute-long trailer opening with John asking not how, but why Sherlock faked his death.今天是《神探夏洛克》粉丝的好日子。英国广播电视台发布了一段即将公映的《神探夏洛克》第三季的预告片——这段精彩的预告片时长达一分钟，在预告片的开始，约翰问夏洛克为什么要诈死。

Following some quick shots of returning supporting characters like Lestrade and Anderson (and John's new love, Mary Morstan), we get a glimpse of a very much alive Sherlock learning from brother Mycroft that John has moved on with his life in Sherlock's two-year absence.接着许多回归第三季的配角纷纷闪现，如莱斯特雷德，安德森（还有约翰的新婚妻子，玛丽·摩斯坦）。我们终于看到了一个活生生的夏洛克，他从哥哥麦考夫那里得知，在他消失两年后，约翰已经开始了新生活。

"What life? I've been away," Sherlock responds, in that classic backhanded style of his that we've missed so much.“什么新生活？我又不在。”夏洛克回答说，他双手背后的惯有姿势让我们思念已久。

Meanwhile, an attack is coming and Sherlock needs to familiarize himself with London.与此同时，伦敦面临着新一轮的危险，夏洛克也必须适应伦敦的新变化。

Sherlock series 3 premieres on BBC One this January 1.《神探夏洛克》第三季将于2014年1月1日在英国广播电视台首映。
